source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot. The video captures the dramatic movement of massive, swirling storm clouds as they churn and evolve over a vast green field. A curtain of rain is visible in the distance as the turbulent, dark clouds move across the sky.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot. The video captures the dramatic movement of massive, swirling storm clouds as they churn and evolve over a vast green field. A curtain of rain is visible in the distance as the turbulent, dark clouds move across the sky.
